title: The Viper's Nest
description: Six months have passed since the attack in South Africa. Former safari guide Cobra McCoors now works for a shadow operation of the US government, trying to track down the team behind the attempt on his life. His next Blue Viper, a mysterious soldier of fortune set on uncovering the secrets of the Viper’s Nest, a place of unearthly, uncontrollable power believed to be hidden deep in the wilds of Central Asia.From the freezing expanses of the Siberian tundra to the shifting sands of the Gobi Desert, Cobra and his team are in a race against time and Blue Viper’s cadre of criminals. But they quickly find more than they bargained for, as prehistoric creatures, family dynamics, and old grudges leave them fighting for their lives.When legends turn lethal, can Cobra and his team prevent their enemies from unleashing the ancient curse of the Viper's Nest?
author: Michael Tumminio
